0.Major_Activities1:
one of the major activities of the rudok lhundup choding monastery is to impart and educate the people about the buddhist philosophy and teachings.
and the society also do services to the lay people by doing pujas and prayers for deceased, sick and disabled people.
and our abbot also does special pujas for the sick people twice in a week.
and there is many buddhist scholars of our monastery who impart teachings and give awareness on buddhist philosophy to the people in and outside of our region.

source_info.purpose: to promote the Tibetan buddhist way of  debating and to impart buddhist knowledge to the lay people of tibetan buddhist origin and to preserve the language and age old tibetan buddhist customs.
